entries.sui_prompt1: style dance. You may be ready to learn some advanced steps.
entries.sui_prompt0: You have become proficient at performing the
entries.title: a choreography teacher
entries.sysmsg_success: You have successfully learned the %TO dance style.
entries.success: There you go! Enjoy the new moves, and remember, keep practicing!
entries.cant_teach_yet: I could teach you some new steps, but you need to practice that dance a little more first. Keep practicing and come back later.
entries.confirm_r1: No, I'd rather not learn the new steps right now.
entries.confirm_r0: Yes, I will spend the experience to learn the new steps.
entries.confirm: I can teach you some new steps for that dance, but you will need to spend some %TO experience to learn them. Do you want to spend %DI %TO experience to learn the new steps?
entries.not_enough_xp: I can teach you some new steps for that dance, but you don't have enough %TO experience to learn them. You must be able to spend at least %DI %TO experience.
entries.cant_teach: Ah, I'm afraid there's nothing I can teach you now. Maybe some other time, eh?
entries.offer_r9: Can you teach me anything for the %TO style?
entries.offer_r8: Can you teach me anything for the %TO style?
entries.offer_r7: Can you teach me anything for the %TO style?
entries.offer_r6: Can you teach me anything for the %TO style?
entries.offer_r5: Can you teach me anything for the %TO style?
entries.offer_r4: Can you teach me anything for the %TO style?
entries.offer_r3: Can you teach me anything for the %TO style?
entries.offer_r2: Can you teach me anything for the %TO style?
entries.offer_r1: Can you teach me anything for the %TO style?
entries.offer_r0: Can you teach me anything for the %TO style?
entries.offer_r10: On second thought, I'd rather not right now.
entries.offer: Tell me what you're interested in and I'll see what I can teach you.
entries.greeting_r1: Not right now. Thank you, though.
entries.greeting_r0: Sure, I'd like to learn something new.
entries.greeting: Hello, friend. Say, I've seen you around. You've got some interesting new moves. If you like, I might be able to teach you a few new steps?
